subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built during the Mughal era?
question_hi: राजस्थान मुगल समय में भविष्य के लिए किस महंगाई स्थल का नाम है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort was built during the Mughal era.
explanation_hi: मेरंगार मगही ने मुगल स्वति के वर्षीय निर्माण की समय में बना गया था।

question_en: Which fort was built by Maharana Pratap Singh?

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: Which fort was built by Maharana Pratap Singh?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap Singh built the Kumbhalgarh Fort in Rajasthan during the Mughal rule.
